ModMetaData.name: Keeping the best Jeans in the Family
ModMetaData.author: Garry Flowers
ModMetaData.description: * Features: * New Faction with random genes * Conflicting genes override each other in a randomized manner and are rerandomized everytime the genome changes (xeno genes always override germline ones). For some reason this is a bit wonky with cosmetic genes. * new genes: * Genophages: Copy one gene from consumed corpses at random (and gain the cannibal trait) * Xeno Implanter: Can pass their xeno genes onto children * Xeno Converter: Converts gained xenogenes into germline equivalents * Dominant Germline: Germline genes override xeno genes * Foreign Excluder: Do not pass on partners genes * Foreign Includer: Pass on all genes of partner * Inheritor: Always Pass on own genes * Genetic Dead End: Do not pass own genes on * Random Genes: Will replace themselves with random ones * Neutral Genes: Do nothing except conflict with other genes
